item.title: US-20 West/US-385 North at US-20/US-385 Split
item.description: US-20 West/US-385 North at US-20/US-385 split in Dawes County. Use US-385 North to Hot Springs, SD; continue west on US-20 for Crawford.

item.title: US-20 West/US-385 North Approaching US-20/US-385 Split
item.description: US-20 West/US-385 North approaching US-20/US-385 split in Dawes County.

item.title: US-20 West at US-385 - Chadron
item.description: US-20 West at US-385 in Chadron. US-385 North joins US-20 west through Chadron.

item.title: US-20 West Approaching US-385 South to Alliance
item.description: US-20 West approaching US-385 South to Alliance. Continue on US-20 west to Crawford. US-385 North joins US-20 westbound.

item.title: US-385 North/US-16 East at US-385/US-16 Split
item.description: US-385 North/US-16 East at US-385/US-16 split in Pennington County.

item.title: US-385 North/US-16 East at SD-244
item.description: US-385 North/US-16 East at SD-244 East to Mount Rushmore. Continue on US-385 North/US-16 East to Hill City.

item.title: End SD-87 North at US-16/US-385
item.description: End SD-87 North at US-16/US-385. Use US-16 West/US-385 South to Crazy Horse, Jewel Cave, and Wind Cave.

item.title: End SD-87 North at US-385/US-16
item.description: End SD-87 North at US-385/US-16 in Pennington County.

item.title: End SD-87 North at US-16/US-385
item.description: End SD-87 North at US-16/US-385 in Pennington County. Use US-16 East/US-385 North to Hill City and Mount Rushmore. Use US-16 West/US-385 South to Crazy Horse.

item.title: SD-87 North at SD-89
item.description: SD-87 North at SD-89 in Custer County. Use SD-89 South to Jct. US-16A and Custer. Use SD-87 North for US-16/US-385, Sylvan Lake Lodge, Hill City, and Crazy Horse Mountain.

item.title: Distance Marker on SD-89 North Approaching SD-87
item.description: Distance Marker at end of SD-89 North approaching SD-87. Distance via SD-87 North to Sylvan Lake Lodge, Jct. US-16/US-385, and Hill City.

item.title: US-385 North/US-16 East/SD-89 North at US-16A
item.description: US-385 North/US-16 East/SD-89 North at US-16A in Custer. Turn left for US-385 North/US-16 East; continue straight for US-16A East/SD-89 North.

item.title: US-385/SD-89 North/US-16 East at US-16A
item.description: US-385/SD-89 North/US-16 East at US-16A in Custer. Use US-395 North/US-16 East to Hill City and Rapid City. Use US-16A East/SD-89 North to Custer State Park.

item.title: US-385/SD-89 North at US-16
item.description: US-385/SD-89 North at US-16 in Custer. US-385 north joins US-16 east through Hill City. SD-89 joins US-16 east through Custer.

item.title: US-385/SD-89 North - Custer
item.description: Entering Custer on US-385/SD-89 North. Custer is the county seat of Custer County.

item.title: US-385/SD-89 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-385/SD-89 North. Distance to Custer, Mount Rushmore, and Lead.

item.title: SD-89 North at US-385 - Pringle
item.description: SD-89 North at US-385 in Pringle. SD-89 joins US-385 north to Custer.

item.title: SD-89 North at US-385
item.description: SD-89 North at US-385 in Pringle. Use US-385 south to Hot Springs; US-385/SD-89 North to Custer.

item.title: SD-89 North Approaching US-385
item.description: SD-89 North approaching US-385 in Pringle.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 59
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 59 - NE-17J Link/US-385/Sidney/Bridgeport.

item.title: US-385 North at NE-25A Link
item.description: US-385 North at NE-25A Link in Chappell. Turn right to continue north on US-385; left for NE-25A Link south to I-80.

item.title: US-385 North Approaching NE-25A Link
item.description: US-385 North approaching NE-25A Link in Chappell. Turn right to continue north on US-385; left for NE-25A Link South/To I-80.

item.title: US-385 North - Entering Nebraska
item.description: Entering Nebraska on US-385 north.

item.title: US-385 North - HIgh Plains Highway
item.description: US-385 North - High Plains Highway. US-385 is marked as the High Plains Highway from the Colorado-Nebraska line to Cheyenne Wells.

item.title: US-138 East at US-385
item.description: US-138 East at US-385 in Sedgwick County. Turn left for US-385 North; continue straight for US-385 South/US-138 East. US-385 joins US-138 through Julesburg.

item.title: US-138 East Approaching US-385
item.description: US-138 East approaching US-385 junction. Turn left for US-385 north to Chappell and Sidney (both destinations in Nebraska). Continue on US-138 East/US-385 South for Julesburg and Holyoke.

item.title: US-385 South at I-76
item.description: US-385 South at I-76 (Exit 180). Use I-76 west to Sterling; I-76 east to Ogallala (NE). This is the first (or last depending on direction) exit in Colorado on I-76.

item.title: US-385 South/To I-76 - Julesburg
item.description: US-385 South/To I-76 - Julesburg. US-385 is marked as the High Plains Highway south to Cheyenne Wells.

item.title: US-138 West Offramp at US-385 South
item.description: US-138 West Offramp at US-385 South in Julesburg. Turn left for US-385 south to Holyoke.

item.title: US-138 West at US-385
item.description: US-138 West at US-385 interchange. Exit for US-385 south to Holyoke. Continue straight for US-385 North/US-138 West.

item.title: US-138 West Approaching US-385
item.description: US-138 West approaching US-385 in Julesburg. Use US-385 South for Holyoke. US-385 North joins US-138 West through Julesburg.

item.title: US-385 North/US-26 East at US-385/US-26 Split
item.description: US-385 North/US-26 East at US-385/US-26 split in Morrill County.

item.title: US-26 East/US-385 North Approaching US-26/US-385 Split
item.description: US-26 East/US-385 North approaching US-26/US-385 split. Turn left for US-385 North to Alliance; left for US-26 East to Oshkosh.

item.title: US-26/NE-92 East at NE-92/US-385
item.description: US-26/NE-92 East at NE-92 East/US-385 in Bridgeport. Turn right for US-385 South/NE-92 East; turn left for US-26 East/US-385 North. US-385 North joins US-26 East through Bridgeport.

item.title: US-26/NE-92 East Approaching US-385
item.description: US-26/NE-92 East approaching US-385 in Bridgeport.

item.title: US-26 East at NE-62A Link to US-385
item.description: US-26 East at NE-62A Link to US-385 in Morrill County.

item.title: US-26 East Approaching NE-62A Link/To US-385
item.description: US-26 East Approaching NE-62A Link/To US-385. Turn right to continue east on US-26.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412 West Approaching US-385/OK-325
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412 West approaching US-385/OK-325 approaching roundabout at the Cimarron County courthouse in Boise City.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North at US-50
item.description: US-287/US-385 North at US-50 in Lamar. US-385 north joins US-50 east; US-287 north joins US-50 west.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North - Prowers County
item.description: Prowers County on US-287/US-385 North.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North at CO-116
item.description: US-287/US-385 North at CO-116 east to Two Buttes. Continue north on US-287/US-385 to Lamar.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North Approaching CO-116
item.description: US-287/US-385 North approaching CO-116 in Baca County.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North at US-160
item.description: US-287/US-385 North at US-160 near Springfield.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North at US-160
item.description: US-287/US-285 north at US-160. Use US-160 west to Pritchett; use US-160 east to Walsh. Continue north on US-287/US-385 for Springfield.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North Approaching US-160
item.description: US-287/US-385 North approaching US-160 near Springfield.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker to Springfield and Lamar on US-287/US-385 north at the Oklahoma-Colorado stateline.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North - Baca County
item.description: Baca County on US-287/US-385 north at the Oklahoma - Colorado stateline.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North - Welcome To Colorado
item.description: Welcome To Colorful Colorado on US-287/US-385 North, at the Oklahoma - Colorado stateline.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North/OK-3 East - Cimarron County
item.description: US-287/US-385 North/OK-3 East in Cimarron County.

item.title: US-287/US-385 North/OK-3 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-287/US-385 North/OK-3 east. Distance to Lamar, CO and Denver, CO.

item.title: US-287 North at US-385/OK-3
item.description: US-287 north at US-385/OK-3 junction. OK-3 joins US-287 north to the Oklahoma - Colorado line. US-385 joins US-287 north to Lamar, Colorado. Notice the route US-385 is spelled out instead of displayed in a typical shield.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 - South Exit of Boise City Roundabout
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 - south exit of the Boise City roundabout. Turn right for US-56/US-64/US-412 West/US-385 South to Clayton, NM and Dalhart, TX. This sign is white as opposed to the usual green sign.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 at OK-325 - West Exit of Boise City Roundabout
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 at OK-325 the west exit of the Boise City Roundabout. Turn right for OK-325 West to Kenton.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East at US-385/OK-325
item.description: Roundabout diagram in front of the Cimarron County Courthouse in Boise City.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 - East Exit of Boise City Roundabout
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3/US-385 at east exit of Boise City roundabout. Turn right for US-56/US-64/US-412/OK-3 East to Guymon and Amarillo, Texas.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-385/US-412 at OK-3/OK-325
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-385/US-412 approaching OK-3/OK-325 in Boise City.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412 East/US-385 North - Boise City
item.description: Entering Boise City on US-56/US-64/US-412 East/US-385 North.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412 East/US-385 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-56/US-64/US-412 East/US-385 North. Distance to Boise City and Guymon. Speed limit on this stretch of highway is 65 MPH.

item.title: US-56/US-64/US-412 East/US-385 North
item.description: US-56/US-64/US-412 East/US-385 North in Cimarron County.

item.title: US-385 North at US-56/US-64/US-412
item.description: US-385 North at US-56/US-64/US-412. Turn left for US-56/US-64/US-412 west; right to continue north on US-385 with US-56/US-64/US-412 east.

item.title: US-385 North At US-56/US-64/US-412
item.description: US-385 North At US-56/US-64/US-412. Turn left for US-56/US-64/US-412 west to Clayton, NM. Turn right for US-56/US-64/US-412 East/US-385 North to Boise City.

item.title: US-385 North at US-56/US-64/US-385/US-412
item.description: US-385 North at US-56/US-64/US-385/US-412 in Cimarron County.
